div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 848px; height: 1px; padding-top: 25px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Legal Document AI Assistant - Database Schema

switch.text: Legal Document AI Assistant - Database Schema

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 97px; margin-left: 41px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 121px; margin-left: 42px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 158px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); line-height: 1.4; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
padding: 5px;

div.div:
id: Integer (PK)
email: String, Unique
username: String, Unique
hashed_password: String
is_active: Boolean
is_admin: Boolean
created_at: DateTime
Relationships:
- has many Documents
- has many Questions

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 97px; margin-left: 321px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 121px; margin-left: 322px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 208px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); line-height: 1.4; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
padding: 5px;

div.div:
id: String/UUID (PK)
owner_id: Integer (FK)
filename: String
original_filename: String
file_path: String
file_size_kb: Integer
file_type: String
status: String
summary: Text
created_at: DateTime
processed_at: DateTime
Relationships:
- belongs to User
- has many Entities
- has many Questions

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 97px; margin-left: 601px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 121px; margin-left: 602px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 138px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); line-height: 1.4; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
padding: 5px;

div.div:
id: Integer (PK)
document_id: String/UUID (FK)
category: String
text: String
Relationships:
- belongs to Document

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 357px; margin-left: 321px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 381px; margin-left: 322px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 158px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); line-height: 1.4; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
padding: 5px;

div.div:
id: Integer (PK)
document_id: String/UUID (FK)
user_id: Integer (FK)
question_text: Text
answer_text: Text
created_at: DateTime
Relationships:
- belongs to Document
- belongs to User

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 520px; margin-left: 41px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.span:
PK - Primary Key
FK - Foreign Key
